programme.title: Role Models

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A defiant mortal (Brenton Thwaites) forms an unlikely alliance with the powerful god Horus (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) to save the world from Set (Gerard Butler), the merciless god of darkness.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victim's daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Big Miracle
programme.desc: A reporter (John Krasinski) in small-town Alaska and his former lover (Drew Barrymore), an environmentalist, try to form an international coalition to rescue three ice-trapped whales.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Hoping to meet her real father and have him walk her down the aisle, a bride secretly invites three men from her mother's (Meryl Streep) past to come to the wedding.

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: A sympathetic woman (Naomi Watts) and her young son (Judah Lewis) form a strong bond with an investment banker (Jake Gyllenhaal) whose life begins to unravel following the death of his wife (Heather Lind).

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028, a robotics company sees a chance to bring its technology to American law enforcement by transforming a critically injured police officer (Joel Kinnaman) into a cyborg.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who's supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

programme.title: Good Time
programme.desc: A bank robber stops at nothing to free his brother from prison, launching himself into a nightlong odyssey through New York's dark and dangerous criminal underworld.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: Skin
programme.desc: Nollywood actress Beverly Naya explores Black beauty and the practice of skin bleaching in African culture.

programme.title: 20th Century Women
programme.desc: In Santa Barbara, Calif., a strong-willed but loving single mother (Annette Bening) raises her teenage son (Lucas Jade Zumann) with the help of two unconventional young women (Elle Fanning, Greta Gerwig) during the summer of 1979.

programme.title: Anthropoid
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Destroy All Monsters!
programme.desc: Scientists (Jun Tazaki, Yoshio Tsuchiya) face Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra and more obscure Japanese monsters sent by she-aliens.

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me
programme.desc: Agent Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) comes to Twin Peaks, Wash., following two unresolved murders and the disappearance of two fellow agents.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Mothra vs. Godzilla
programme.desc: Japan comes under attack from two monsters in a giant monster battle between a rampaging Godzilla and the colossal genetically engineered moth called Mothra.

programme.title: Skin Can Breathe

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in From the Cold

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel

programme.desc: Nami tem o sonho de desenhar seu prprio mapa mundi e, aps a saga dos Chapus de Palha em Alabasta, decide pr em prtica suas habilidades como cartgrafa e comear a realizar seu sonho.
programme.sub-title: O Despertar da Navegadora! Em Busca do Sonho Tenaz!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Tajio, um aprendiz cozinheiro, despenca de um navio de guerra da Marinha dentro do Going Merry, e Sanji decide ajudar o garoto, em quem reconhece muitos de seus sonhos quando ainda era um aprendiz de Zeff.
programme.sub-title: A Herana de uma Receita! Sanji, o Homem de Ferro do Curry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Em uma ilha famosa por seu festival de fogos de artifcio, Usopp tentar ajudar a pequena Kodama a realizar o sonho que herdou de seus pais.
programme.sub-title: Eu os Farei Florescer! O Homem Usopp e os Fogos de Artifcio!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A histria de como Zoro, ento caador de piratas, conheceu seus camaradas Yosaku e Johnny!
programme.sub-title: O Famoso Caador de Piratas! Zoro, o Espadachim Errante!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Os Chapus de Palha chegam a uma ilha praticamente deserta, exceo de Zenny, um velho de corao frgil e os bodes que o fazem companhia.
programme.sub-title: Zenny da Ilha dos Bodes e o Navio Pirata das Montanhas!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: O velho Zenny fez fortuna emprestando dinheiro aos piratas, mas sempre sonhou em se tornar, ele mesmo, um pirata. Quando a Marinha tenta capturar os Chapus de Palha, o velho pode finalmente realizar seu desejo!
programme.sub-title: Que Tal? A Ambio de Zenny, o Agiota!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy e os Chapus de Palha ajudaro o velho Zenny a realizar seu antigo sonho: O de tornar-se um pirata e defender o seu maior tesouro, a todo custo!
programme.sub-title: O Paradeiro do Tesouro da Ilha! O Ataque dos Piratas Zenny!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Os Chapus de Palha ancoram em busca de suprimentos em uma cidade porturia assolada por um prefeito que cobra impostos sobre tudo e todos. Luffy e Robin tornam-se amigos de um cientista maluco apaixonado pela Bruma do Arco-ris!
programme.sub-title: A Lenda da Bruma do Arco-ris! O Velho Henzo da Ilha Luluka!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Usopp, Nico e Zoro acabam presos na Bruma do Arco-ris com Henzo. O cientista procura por respostas, os Chapus de Palha querem tesouros, e fantasmas que assombram as brumas querem as almas de todos!
programme.sub-title: Habitantes da Terra da Eternidade! Os Piratas Abbora!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy e o bando procuram uma forma de fugir de Concerto dos Smios, mas a Bruma do Arco-ris um labirinto sem fuga. Na costa, Nami, Chopper, e Sanji encaram uma vida de trabalhos forados por no pagarem impostos!
programme.sub-title: Lembranas do Lar! O Cemitrio Pirata Sem Fuga!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami adentra a bruma em misso para salvar seus companheiros e, talvez, caar uns tesouros. O Prefeito a quer morta, mas o bando protegido por um marinheiro misterioso.
programme.sub-title: Um Confronto Inevitvel! As Tramas de Wetton e a Torre do Arco-ris!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: O confronto com o Prefeito Wetton chega a uma concluso explosiva, quando os Chapus de Palha partem para fugir da Bruma do Arco-ris ou ficarem nela presos para sempre.
programme.sub-title: E a Lenda tem Incio! O Outro Lado do Arco-ris!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Os Chapus de Palha quase acabam mortos pela queda dos destroos de um navio de 200 anos de idade. Os boatos de uma ilha nos cus seriam verdadeiros? Luffy, Zoro e Sanji mergulham para descobrir!
programme.sub-title: O Log Roubado! O Rei das Recuperaes, Masira!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ainda em busca de uma rota para a ilha do cu, os Chapus de Palha traam o caminho para Jaya. Enquanto isso, Ace Punho de Fogo pega carona em um navio comandado por Buggy, o Palhao!
programme.sub-title: Verdadeiros Monstros! No Mexa com os Piratas do Barba Branca!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Os Chapus de Palha ancoram em uma cidade tomada por marginais, e Nami faz os rapazes jurarem no se meter em encrenca. Mas quando Bellamy e seus piratas procuram briga, Luffy quebra a promessa!
programme.sub-title: Pare de Sonhar! Mock Town, a Cidade do Escrnio!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico Robin encontra um homem que pode conhecer o caminho para a Ilha do Cu. Luffy e seu bando s precisam sobreviver ao massacre dos smios que querem afundar o Going Merry!
programme.sub-title: Piratas Diferenciados! Um Homem que Fala de Sonhos e a Busca Pelo Rei Submarino!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy e seu bando chegam ao lar de Montblanc Cricket: o homem com a chave para chegar Ilha do Cu. H apenas um pequeno problema - ele herdeiro de uma distinta linhagem de lendrios mentirosos.
programme.sub-title: A Famlia Lendria! Noland, o Mentiroso!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Montblanc Cricket aceita ajudar os Chapus de Palha a chegar Ilha do Cu, mas primeiro eles devem se aventurar nas profundezas mais sombrias de uma floresta infestada de aranhas para capturar um pssaro com um tenaz senso de direo.
programme.sub-title: Acelerem Para as Nuvens! Capturem o Pssaro do Sul!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Enquanto os Chapus de Palha enfrentam criaturas da floresta em busca do Pssaro do Sul, Montblanc e seus smios so brutalmente atacados pelos Piratas de Bellamy!
programme.sub-title: Sonhos No Se Realizam? Bellamy vs. A Aliana Saruyama!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy deu a outra face em seu primeiro encontro com Bellamy, mas agora quer acertar as contas pelo velho Montblanc! Enquanto isso, um novo bando de piratas est de olho nos Chapus de Palha!
programme.sub-title: O Homem de 100 Milhes! O Maior Poder do Mundo e o Pirata Barba Negra!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Graas a modificaes no Merry, os Chapus de Palha seguem para a ilha do cu! Mas com o bando do Barba Negra em seu encalo, navegar a Corrente de Gancho no ser trabalho fcil!
programme.sub-title: Rumo aos Cus! Peguem a Corrente de Gancho!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Alcanar o mar de nuvens foi tarefa fcil perto do trabalho de sobreviver a ele, quando criaturas do mar do cu atacam o Merry, Usopp quase se afoga e um estranho Cavaleiro do Cu d um aviso aos Chapus de Palha!
programme.sub-title: Naveguem o Mar Branco! O Cavaleiro do Cu e o Porto nas Nuvens!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Aps uma carona em um elevador camaro, os Chapus de Palha alcanam Skypiea! Os piratas, porm, ainda tm muito a aprender sobre o local, mas uma bela anjo se torna seu guia turstico.
programme.sub-title: A Terra de Deus, Skypiea! Anjos em uma Praia de Nuvens!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A pressa de Nami em explorar o reino proibido do Jardim de Cima a coloca prestes a receber a Clera de Deus, e o bando sofre o Julgamento do Cu por no pagar os impostos de imigrao!
programme.sub-title: O Solo Sagrado Proibido! A Ilha Onde Vive Deus e o Julgamento dos Cus!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Os Chapus de Palha j sabem o que viver do outro lado da lei, mas taxas de imigrao no pagas e o ataque de Nami a um Boina Branca garantem a Luffy uma sentena de morte!
programme.sub-title: J Criminosos?! Os Mantenedores da Lei de Skypiea!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Zoro, Chopper e Robin esto aprisionados a bordo do Going Merry! Luffy agora precisa salv-los arriscando-se nos solos sagrados do Jardim de Cima!
programme.sub-title: A Fuga Possvel?! O Desafio de Deus!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Conis ajuda Luffy e seus companheiros e iniciar sua misso de resgate, mas o Chapu de Palha tem um pressentimento. A busca por respostas desperta a ira de Deus contra o bando!
programme.sub-title: Cilada na Rua Graciosa! O Todo Poderoso Enel!

programme.title: O Chamado de Xangai
programme.desc: Um advogado de Nova York enviado a Xangai a negcios e logo enfrenta muitos problemas com a lei.

programme.title: O Prazer de sua Companhia
programme.desc: Um cara pede sua namorada em casamento e ela simplesmente cai morta. Seu melhor amigo insiste em arrumar encontros para ele. Certo dia, para tirar o amigo do seu p, ele pede uma garonete em casamento - ela aceita e uma grande confuso comea.

programme.desc: Um romance de conto de fadas toma um rumo inesperado quando Mark descobre que sua bela noiva, Connie, est planejando roub-lo. Para no ser tolo, Mark embarca em uma misso para ver at onde Connie ir roubar seu dinheiro.

programme.title: O Prncipe das Mulheres
programme.desc: O executivo de marketing Marcus Graham um mulherengo dedicado boa vida, liberdade e felicidade da conquista. Isso tudo at ele conhecer uma mulher elegante e esperta que trata os homens da mesma forma que ele trata as mulheres.

programme.title: Encalhados
programme.desc: Megan de 28 anos, vai a um reencontro de amigos da escola e percebe que sua vida continua a mesma de 10 anos atrs. Porm, ao receber um pedido de casamento de seu namorado, ela entra em crise.

programme.title: Quase casados
programme.desc: Depois de perceber que ela perseguia um relacionamento romntico com o cara errado quando estava no ensino mdio, uma jovem retorna sua pequena cidade para encontrar sua antiga paixo e declarar suas intenes romnticas para ele.

programme.title: Um casamento muito louco
programme.desc: Natasha e Roman so um jovem casal que sonham com uma festa de casamento em uma cidade do litoral europeu. Mas o padrasto de Natasha, um conservador gerente do municpio, enxerga no casamento a possibilidade perfeita para alavancar a sua carreira.

programme.title: O Vale do Amor
programme.desc: Um jovem tem que viajar para um vale remoto para receber uma herana inesperada do seu falecido av - duas vacas e um burro. Esta viagem ir transformar-se em uma jornada que mudar a sua vida.

programme.desc: Enquanto os criminosos do mundo continuam a morrer, L atende representantes de vrias naes.

programme.desc: Light, conhecido mundialmente como Kira, prova a extenso dos poderes do Death Note.

programme.title: O Quatrilho
programme.desc: Em 1910, em uma comunidade rural de imigrantes italianos no Rio Grande do Sul, dois casais dividem a mesma casa. O tempo faz com que uma das esposas se interesse pelo marido da outra. Ambos decidem fugir e recomear uma vida nova em outro lugar.

programme.title: Com Amor, Van Gogh
programme.desc: Um ano aps o suicdio de Vincent Van Gogh, Armand Roulin parte para a cidade francesa de Arles e, junto s pessoas que conheceram Vincent, inicia uma investigao no intuito de decifrar se o artista realmente se matou.

programme.title: Sem Segurana Nenhuma

programme.title: Acima das Nuvens
programme.desc: H 20 anos, Maria ficou famosa por sua interpretao no teatro. Agora, ela tem que enfrentar o fato de que uma jovem estrela de Hollywood ir interpretar o mesmo papel. Alm disso, ela convidada a dividir o palco com a novata, mas em outro papel.

programme.title: Um Porto Seguro
programme.desc: Uma mulher misteriosa se muda para uma pequena cidade e recomea sua vida. Apesar da moa estar determinada a no formar laos afetivos na nova cidade, ela no consegue cumprir esse objetivo e acaba levantando questionamentos sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Sombras do Terror
programme.desc: Adolescente que mora com o av abusivo tenta proteger o melhor amigo contra os valentes da escola. Ao descobrir uma criatura assassina em seu galpo de ferramentas, ele e o colega bolam um plano de vingana.

programme.title: Natureza Selvagem
programme.desc: Oito adolescentes que sobreviveram ao Holocausto encontram refgio em um orfanato abandonado, onde tm que enfrentar fome, sede e um grupo de violentos lobos.

programme.title: Sobibor

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: A deciso de Kazemaru de deixar o time deixou Endou arrasado e tirou sua vontade de praticar. Nada que algum diga parece ter um efeito nele.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: As notcias sobre a existncia de um atacante de chamas mandam Raimon para Okinawa, esperando que seja Gouenji Shuuya. Mas que coisas inesperadas podem acontecer ao longo do caminho.
programme.sub-title: A grande batalha no mar do sul

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: Logo aps chegar a Okinawa, Raimon inicia a busca pelo atacante. Enquanto procuram, Fubuki e Domon encontram um jogador que afirma ser o atacante.

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O tsunami revela a Raimon que ele se juntou ao clube de futebol da escola e eles querem brincar com eles. Raimon vai para o Oumihara Junior High, e o jogo comea.
programme.sub-title: O jogo de futebol rtmico radical

programme.desc: O jogo entre Raimon e Oumihara continua, sem nenhuma das equipes se afastando. No final, Raimon vence, mas uma vitria estreita.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze
programme.desc: O retorno de Gouenji, juntamente com a vitria contra o Epsilon Remastered, elevaram o esprito de Raimon. Eles decidem voltar para casa para descansar. Mas assim que eles voltam, Diamond Dust quer que Raimon os enfrente em um jogo.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.desc: Raimon exige que o treinador Hitomiko explique por que Gran a chamou de irm, entre outras coisas. Ela promete explicar tudo depois que eles chegarem ao Monte Fuji.

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.title: Super Onze

programme.desc: Hyuga e Tsubasa esto mostrando seu talento, e os chutes so dignos desta final. Todos sabem que, no fundo, um duelo pessoal. Quem ser o campeo?

programme.desc: A viagem do time para a Europa anunciada! Hyuga o capito, mas Tsubasa est determinado a jogar.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: Taro Misaki, que mora na Frana, foi convocado para a Seleo Juvenil Japonesa. Os trs anos que passou afastado abalaram sua confianca, mas jogar com Tsubasa novamente o deixa animado. Agora ele desafia a seleo Francesa para se provar!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: Tsubasa volta ao campo em gande estilo! Na partida contra o Munique, ele aplica uma jogada decisiva. Com Tsubasa de volta, o time joga de maneira totalmente diferente. Ento Hyuga e Tsubasa decidem deixar tudo ainda mais interessante.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: chegada a cerimnia de abertura do Torneio Juvenil Internacional, e Misaki relembra seu tempo no Japo e tudo o que se passou. Mas nem todas as memrias so felizes. A carreira de seu pai como artista no tem sido fcil para nenhum dos dois.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc

programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A neurotic, twice divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mom to solve his personal problems.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: Red Rocket
programme.desc: Mikey Saber (a magnetic Simon Rex) a charismatic con man and washed-up porn star plots his return to the big time from small-town Texas in this wild, fiercely funny portrait of an American hustler and a hometown that barely tolerates him.

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: Adapted from William Shakespeare, the film tells the story of two couples, confirmed bachelor Benedick and caustic Beatrice, and young Claudio and innocent Hero. Playful bickering defines one couple, whereas romance and betrayal describe the other.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Unforgettable and powerful, this winner of 9 Academy Awards, including Best Picture, Best Director (Anthony Minghella) and Best Supporting Actress (Juliette Binoche) unfolds an incredible tale of passion, intrigue, and adventure.

programme.title: The Other Boleyn Girl
programme.desc: Two sisters, Anne and Mary, are driven by their ambitious family to seduce the king of England in order to advance their position in court. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: My Policeman
programme.desc: A tale of forbidden romance and changing social conventions, 'My Policeman' follows the relationships between three people policeman Tom, teacher Marion and museum curator Patrick and their emotional and complex journey that spans decades.

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: Adapted by Julian Fellowes (Downtown Abbey) from the play by William Shakespeare.

programme.title: Letters to Juliet
programme.desc: In modern Verona, where women seeking their Romeos leave letters to Juliet, a young writer (Amanda Seyfried) finds a life-altering 50-year-old letter.

programme.desc: SWF seeks female to share apt in West 70s. Non-smoker, professional preferred. An innocent want ad opens the door to murderous, unrelenting terror in this pulse-pounding psychological shocker starring Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh. Rated: R

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: As the entire nation watches the presidential campaign hurtle towards Election Day, one soldier races to uncover the conspiracy behind it - a conspiracy that seeks to destroy democracy itself.

programme.title: Limitless
programme.desc: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: As the entire nation watches the presidential campaign hurtle towards Election Day, one soldier races to uncover the conspiracy behind it - a conspiracy that seeks to destroy democracy itself.

programme.title: Capote

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Emma Thompson stars in the captivating romance based on Jane Austen's classic novel of two sisters' search for love in strict Victorian society.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.desc: Rising stars Amy Adams and Ben McKenzie light up the screen in this award-winning comedy about love, family, ambition, and the choices that come with each. When worldly art dealer Madeleine (Embeth Davidtz) meets her new Southern in-laws. Rated: R

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Quincy and Monica fall in love as teens and share an all-consuming interest in basketball, but they struggle to keep their relationship alive as they pursue success as professional athletes.

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan (George Clooney) flies all over for work, but after meeting a passenger he learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections we make along the way.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: The Homesman

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk

programme.title: I Kill Giants

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: In the vein of BATMAN BEGINS and SIN CITY, THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: In a monster-infested world, Joel (Dylan O'Brien) learns his high school sweetheart (Jessica Henwick) is just 80 miles away. Now, Joel must discover his inner hero, facing unknown dangers on the impossible journey to be with the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter

programme.title: The Spirit

programme.desc: In the remote desert of New Mexico, The Manhattan Project is materializing the World War II effort to build the atomic bomb.

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers

programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: F. Scott Fitzgerald's fascinating tale of studio politics in early Hollywood is breathtakingly brought to the screen by director Elia Kazan and screenwriter Harold Pinter.

programme.title: The Killer Elite
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: And Justice for All
programme.desc: When a corrupt judge is charged with rape, Arthur Kirkland must defend him. Kirkland has had problems with the judge in the past, including one incident when the judge wrongly sentenced his client, Jeff McCullaugh, because of a technicality. Rated R

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Superstar Clint Eastwood and director Don Siegel re-team for their fifth film in this fascinating account of the only three men ever to escape from the infamous maximum security prison at Alcatraz.

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: Brannigan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.sub-title: Were Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaidos Army Gathers!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai's allies from their rendezvous.
programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin'emon, Oden steps in. Kin'emon is impressed when he sees Oden's strength and pledges his life to serve him.
programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others.
programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers.
programme.sub-title: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Enraged by Orochi's tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected.
programme.sub-title: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano.
programme.sub-title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido's mansion. Even though Oden's group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
programme.sub-title: The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head.
programme.sub-title: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-hour Struggle!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano.
programme.sub-title: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As Kin'emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden's family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children.
programme.sub-title: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
programme.sub-title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin'emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat.
programme.sub-title: The Sea Is For Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido's army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills.
programme.sub-title: The Worst Generation Charges in! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin'emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido's army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: Double Team
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in the flames of hell and brought to Earth, Hellboy was rescued from sinister forces by the benevolent Dr. Broom, who raised him to be a hero. Hellboy stands as the key line of defense against an evil madman who seeks to destroy mankind.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: Henry is resurrected from death with no memory, and he must save his wife from a telekinetic warlord with a plan to bio-engineer soldiers.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Flame Of Barbary Coast
programme.desc: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

programme.title: Big Jake
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High

programme.desc: Com a sua carreira em Hollywood em derrocada, Orson Welles tem a necessidade de se recuperar da falncia de seu casamento.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA sequestrada, h somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontr-la um notrio ex-mercenrio, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: Captulo 27
programme.desc: Nova York, 1980: um dos msicos mais queridos do mundo baleado do lado de fora de sua casa. Estrelado por Jared Leto e Lindsay Lohan, o Captulo 27 conta a histria dos dias que antecederam a morte de Mark David Chapman de John Lennon.

programme.title: A Recompensa
programme.desc: Depois de passar 12 anos na priso, um famoso ladro est de volta para receber o que lhe devido.

programme.title: Roubo a Mfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da mfia comea um trabalho to grande que os torna alvos tanto da mfia quanto do FBI.

programme.desc: Gabriela (Gabriela Simoni), uma menina de onze anos, filha de um jogador de futebol, sequestrada durante a Copa do Mundo por um grupo de terroristas.

programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso fora ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polcia e da mfia, desencadeando uma perseguio.

Uma manh eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles tm a fazer pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Ento eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins comeam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Um Santo Vizinho

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora

programme.title: S.O.S Mulheres ao Mar 2

programme.desc: Uma terapeuta de casais, feliz no casamento, descobre que os pais esto se divorciando e tudo sai do controle.

programme.title: Sem Lei

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657

programme.title: JACK: A Caixa Maldita
programme.desc: Quando um brinquedo antigo doado a um museu localizado no corao de uma floresta, no demora muito para a funcionria Casey Reynolds acreditar que o palhao sinistro de dentro da caixa tem vida prpria.

programme.desc: Para o seu reality show sobre caa aos fantasmas, uma equipe de produo se tranca dentro de um hospital psiquitrico abandonado que supostamente assombrado e pode ser que isso seja verdade demais.

programme.title: Armadilha Explosiva

programme.title: O Despertar de Um Assassino

programme.title: Sombras da Lei
programme.desc: Sean Casey, um jovem advogado que, como novo membro da promotoria, escalado para uma importante investigao. Agora ele est mais prximo de desvendar um mistrio de corrupo policial em Nova Iorque.

programme.desc: A histria ambientada na Guerra Fria e acompanha um esquadro de heris reunidos pela extinta Unio Sovitica. Depois de passar anos escondendo suas identidades, eles tero enfrentar uma perigosa fora do passado.

programme.title: Tubaro De Malibu
programme.desc: Em Malibu, um tsunami provoca o reaparecimento de uma espcie pr-histrica de tubaro, que se acreditava estar extinta e que se dedica a atacar os banhistas.

programme.desc: Mason um brilhante cientista que acredita que os seres humanos so programados para destruir tudo o que encontram pela frente. Para corrigir os erros da humanidade, ele decide hackear a mente humana, sem pensar nas consequncias de seus atos.

programme.title: O Degelo

programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.desc: Ela uma professora antiquada, que inspira os alunos de uma cidadezinha. Mas eles no sabem que o passatempo favorito dela fazer justia com as prprias mos.

programme.title: Misso Quase Impossvel
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espio Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difcil at hoje: cuidar dos trs filhos de sua namorada, que no gostaram muito do namorado de sua me.

programme.title: Histrias de Amor

programme.desc: Victoria Tremont, entediada com a vida, quer encontrar algum especial. Um estranho entra na cafeteria e no responde ao seu charme. Ela descobre que ele dirige um ministrio de moradias e decide se voluntariar, mesmo que precise mentir.

programme.title: Outono em Nova York
programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquento que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso srio com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que ter com ela outro rpido e fcil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos fcil ou rpido.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: A Grande Guerra

programme.title: Hatfields e McCoys: Sangue Ruim

programme.desc: Condenado por trfico, o jovem Ron tenta no chamar muito a ateno, mas logo notado por outros presos. Para no ser violentado, faz amizade com o lder de uma gangue e comea a receber proteo e benefcios. At que chega o dia de pagar a dvida.

programme.desc: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, nascido com um sentido olfativo superior, cria o melhor perfume do mundo. Seu trabalho, no entanto, toma um rumo sombrio enquanto ele procura o perfume definitivo.

programme.title: A ltima Fortaleza
programme.desc: Seu servio ao seu pas o tornou um heri. Um erro o tornou prisioneiro. Para o General Eugene Irwin (Redford), apenas uma questo de cumprir sua sentena, at que ele descobre que seus colegas de cela esto sendo assassinatos.

programme.title: A Fora do Destino

programme.title: A Fuga

programme.title: A Luz Divina - S1E0

programme.title: O Drago de Natal
programme.desc: Ayden, uma jovem mulher na Europa medieval, a nica pessoa que pode salvar o Natal depois de um duende moribundo lhe entregar um cristal mgico. Ayden e outros rfos devem escapar s criaturas de fantasia para devolver o feitio ao norte.

programme.desc: Fugindo de uma tragdia pessoal, um pai e seu filho se estabelecem em Sugarcreek, Ohio, uma cidade predominantemente Amish, onde so acolhidos por trs irms. Uma policial local, porm, comea a suspeitar do passado misterioso dos recm-chegados.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E43
programme.desc: Mai ganha controle do Drago Alado de R de Marik, mas incapaz de decifrar como liberar suas habilidades extremamente poderosas!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E44
programme.desc: No quarto dos Duelos Finais da Cidade de Batalhas, o oponente misterioso de Kaiba ... Ishizu! Com o poder de seu Colar do Milnio, Ishizu pode ver o futuro, inclusive cada carta que Kaiba est planejando jogar!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E45
programme.desc: Usando a mgica de seu Colar do Milnio, Ishizu j viu o resultado do duelo ela derrotar Kaiba com sua armadilha! Como Kaiba pode vencer quando ele j est destinado a perder? hora de Kaiba mudar o futuro!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S2E46
programme.desc: Com a maldade de Marik crescendo, Ishizu revela os segredos da linhagem dela: como Marik passou a ser, de uma criana generosa, um tirano em busca de poder e do domnio mundial? Ser que Yugi pode salvar Marik, ou ele est alm da salvao?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E36
programme.desc: Nankatsu empata o placar no segundo tempo graas a Takasugi. Tsubasa marcar mais um gol, ou ser que Azumaichi conseguir domar Nankatsu?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E37
programme.desc: A partida entre Nankatsu e Hanawa comea e Tsubasa enfrenta os irmos Tachibana, que agora mostraro um novo chute especial para derrotar Nankatsu.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E38
programme.desc: Tsubasa ferido tentando defender o gol. Os irmos Tachibana aproveitam e marcam o gol do empate. Tsubasa poder retornar antes do final da partida?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E39
programme.desc: Faltam alguns minutos para o fim, e o time de Nankatsu no consegue se aproximar da pequena rea. Os irmos Tachibana tentaro uma nova estratgia.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E40
programme.desc: Estamos nas quartas de final do torneio nacional: Furano contra Minami-iwa. Matsuyama e seu time no conseguem neutralizar o ataque dos oponentes.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E41
programme.desc: Nankatsu joga contra Hirado. O vencedor avanar para as semifinais. Tsubasa deve enfrentar o poderoso Hiroshi Jito, capito e zagueiro do time.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E42
programme.desc: Depois de uma desvantagem esmagadora, proporcionada pela dupla Hirado, Tsubasa decide arriscar e tenta dar o famoso chute com o efeito de Roberto.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E43
programme.desc: Nas semifinais, o primeiro a jogar o Meiwa contra Toho. Sem Hyuga na quadra, Meiwa tira vantagem de Toho, enquanto Hyuga assite o jogo do banco.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E44
programme.desc: No ltimo jogo das semifinais, Nankatsu enfrenta Furano e seu capito, Hikaru Matsuyama, vestindo o nmero dez como Tsubasa. Quem ir para a final?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E45
programme.desc: Furano empata na segunda metade da partida. Os ferimentos de Tsubasa esto piorando, mas ele tenta chutar mais uma vez. Matsuyama tenta impedi-lo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E46
programme.desc: Na final do torneio, Tsubasa espera se recuperar de sua leso para jogar contra Toho. Hyuga decide pedir ao treinador Kitazune que o deixe jogar.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E47
programme.desc: Estamos nos primeiros cinco minutos do jogo entre Nankatsu e Toho, e a tenso na quadra pode ser cortada com uma faca.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E48
programme.desc: Apesar da disciplina de Nankatsu, Toho domina com dois gols de diferena graas ao seu capito, Kojiro Hyuga, e ao seu poderoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E49
programme.desc: Apesar da recomendao mdica, Tsubasa quer continuar na quadra. Ishizaki e os outros tentam defender o gol. Hyuga usa seu famoso chute de tigre.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E50
programme.desc: Nankatsu e Toho tm trs gols cada. No calor da partida, Takasugi de Nankatsu comete uma falta, dando a Hyuga um chute livre. Ele marcar um gol?

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E51
programme.desc: Se empatarem na prorrogao, os dois times sero campees, mas Tsubasa e Hyuga no querem dividir o ttulo. Este o ltimo jogo de Tsubasa no Japo.

programme.title: Super Campees: Captain Tsubasa - S1E52
programme.desc: Hyuga e Tsubasa esto mostrando seu talento, e os chutes so dignos desta final. Todos sabem que, no fundo, um duelo pessoal. Quem ser o campeo?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc
programme.desc: Com o fim do grande campeonato, uma partida entre incrveis estudantes colegiais se aproxima!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E2
programme.desc: A viagem do time para a Europa anunciada! Hyuga o capito, mas Tsubasa est determinado a jogar.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E3
programme.desc: No treino entre o time do Japo e o Hamburgo, Wakabayashi exibe sua defesa de ferro. Schneider emprega um ataque devastador e torna impossvel que marquem um gol. Enquanto isso Hyuga est furioso. E ento vem Tsubasa

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E4
programme.desc: O amistoso contra o Hamburgo foi desastroso para o Japo, e eles retomam seu planejamento. O capito Matsuyama busca a confiana dos outros, enquanto Hyuga tenta superar Schneider. Enquanto isso, Wakabayashi faz um anncio surpreendente.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E5
programme.desc: Taro Misaki, que mora na Frana, foi convocado para a Seleo Juvenil Japonesa. Os trs anos que passou afastado abalaram sua confianca, mas jogar com Tsubasa novamente o deixa animado. Agora ele desafia a seleo Francesa para se provar!
